BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Vanilla Trading Expanded] Add a Kwazaari Bank.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: With this enabled, you will get a truly dwarven bank that will extort you for all you have.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Core] Replace glitterworld medicine.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Makes it possible to substitute Glitterworld Medicine in any recipe with medicine from Beyond Our Reach.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Omni Core Drill] Integrate Omni Core Drill into Beyond Our Reach Lore.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: With this integration, Omni Core Drill will be retextured, moved to pre-solar tier of technology, cost a lot of Solar resources, and use far more power (also with RePowered).

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Without Combat extended] Add new mortar shell variants.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds ultra tech level mortar shells that can be used to bombard the enemies.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [ArchotechExpanded] Allow to make Nano-, Pico- and Attomachinery from Nano-, Pico- and Femto-clusters.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds recipes allowing to use Archotech Expanded's materials as ingredients for Beyond Our Reach's similar materials.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [ArchotechExpanded] Add new research for Archotech Expanded bionics.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Bionics from Archotech Expanded will now require a new Archotech-level research to be built; Archotech Mimicry research will be also integrated into the tree.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [ArchotechExpanded] Rebalance Archotech Bench.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Rebalances the Archotech Bench around the Beyond Our Reach Lore and materials, making it more expensive to build and use.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [ArchotechExpanded] Merge Archotech Expanded Resources.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Removes the possibility to build the nano-, pico- and attomachinery and changes the recipes to use the BOR's nano-, pico-, and femtoclusters instead.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [ArchotechExpanded] Remove stuff properties from Archotech Expanded -machinery.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Archotech Expanded materials - the nano-, pico- and attomachinery will no longer be usable as build materials - patch is useful to prevent yourself from building indestructible stuff.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Save Our Ship 2] Add Save Our Ship Hypoxia resistance to BOR Lungs.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Will attempt to add Hypoxia resistance to Solar, Quasar, Tenebral and Umbral lungs.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Save Our Ship 2] Add Save Our Ship EVA capability to BOR Armors.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds EVA capability to BOR armors, as well as Royalty-added BOR armors and Rimsenal-added BOR armors.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Royalty] Add Royalty-like permits to Kwazaari faction.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: With this integration, Kwazaari will utilize the Shattered Empire's honor system with their own "honor" - scrip, permits and scrip trader.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Royalty] Add Royalty prestige BOR armor.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds Solar, Quasar and Tenebral tiers of Royalty armors (Prestige Recon, Prestige Marine, Cataphract and Prestige cataphract) and allows them to be used with Royal Titles. Kwazaar Bazaar will get a heavy marine variant.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Royalty] Add BOR variants of Royalty implants.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds three tiers of Royalty-like implants to the game: psychic sensitizer, psychic harmonizer, psychic reader, neurocalculator, learning assistant, gastro-analyzer, immunenhancer, coagulator, healing enhancer, toughskin glands, armorskin glands, stoneskin glands, aesthetic shaper, aesthetic nose, reprocessor stomach, circadian assistant, circadian half-cycler, mindscrew, drill arm, field hand, hand talon, elbow blade, knee spike, venom fangs, and venom talon. Combat Extended compatible.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Royal Arsenal] Add BOR variants of Royal Arsenal armors.
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds Solar, Quasar and Tenebral tiers of Royal Arsenal armors to the game: ranseur, personal cloaking system, guardian armor, phalanx armor, as well as their prestige variants. Combat Extended compatible.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Rimsenal - Federation Faction Pack] Add BOR variants of Rimsenal Federation apparel
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds Solar, Quasar and Tenebral tiers of Rimsenal: Federation apparel to the game: jumpsuit, Judicator, Marksman and unity guard. Combat Extended compatible.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Rimsenal - Augmented Vanilla Pack] Add BOR variants of Rimsenal - Augmented Vanilla Pack apparel
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds Solar, Quasar and Tenebral tiers of Rimsenal - Augmented Vanilla Pack apparel to the game: exosuit, protective gear and tac gear. Combat Extended compatible.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Rimsenal - Core] Allow Rimsenal benches to use BOR linkable facilities
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Allows the Rimsenal benches to use BOR linkables to speed up their work. This is specific because Rimsenal uses a different classname from all the other mods. You probably want this on.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Rimsenal - Core] Add BOR variants of Rimsenal satchels
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds 3 variants of the Rimsenal's portable bomb satchels. CE Compatible.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Rimsenal - Core] Add BOR variants of Rimsenal - Core apparel
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds Solar, Quasar and Tenebral tiers of Rimsenal - Core apparel to the game. Combat Extended compatible.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Rimputers 1.5] Integrate Rimputers into BOR tech tree
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Rimputers' Quantum Computer will be required for all BOR researches.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Rimputers (No Dubs Bad Hygiene)] Integrate Rimputers into BOR tech tree
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Rimputers' Quantum Computer will be required for all BOR researches.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Rimputers 1.5] Improve Rimputers' progress curve
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Rimputers research steps will require previous computer type to be connected to allow for research.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Rimputers (No Dubs Bad Hygiene)] Improve Rimputers' progress curve
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Rimputers research steps will require previous computer type to be connected to allow for research.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Rimputers 1.5] Retexture Rimputers' Quantum Computer
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Rimputers' Quantum Computer will be retextured to fit BOR theme.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Rimputers (No Dubs Bad Hygiene)] Retexture Rimputers' Quantum Computer
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Rimputers' Quantum Computer will be retextured to fit BOR theme.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Rimmunizations(forked)] Integrate Rimmunizations into BOR Lore
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Makes the Rimmunization research tree the prerequisite for BOR Drugs.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Replimat] Move Replimat buildings to Beyond tab
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds Replimat buildings to Beyond architect tab and puts them in a dropdown.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Replimat] Make the isolinear components craftable with BOR Benches
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds a costly recipe to both tier 2 and tier 3 benches that will allow you to create the isolinear components for Replimat.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Replimat] Rebalance Replimat buildings in line with Beyond Our Reach
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Increases costs and power consumption of the Replimat buildings. Fixes ReplimatHopper's texture placement.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Replimat] Move Replimat research to Quasar tech
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Moves Replimat research to BOR Tier 2 research and increases its cost.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Replimat] Make Replimat components be carried by Kwazaari traders
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Adds a trade tag to isolinear module so that it's carried by Kwazaari merchants in bulk.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Repair hubs] Integrate RepairHubs into BOR Research
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Moves RepairHubs into BOR Research as Solar-tier technology.

BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingLabel: [Repair hubs] Integrate RepairHubs into cost structure of BOR
BeyondOurReachModSettings.ModSettingDef.settingDesc: Makes Repair Hubs use BOR materials to be built.
